explains: adj. 多目标的；多种用途的

sentences.en: Parvis and his colleagues have been working on their multipurpose lens since 2004.
sentences.cn: Parvis和他的同事们从2004年以来一直在研制这种多功能隐形眼镜。

sentences.en: The del has a high collar, is often brightly colored, comes with a multipurpose sash.
sentences.cn: 蒙古袍高领、色彩鲜艳，有着一个多功能的肩带。

sentences.en: In particular, I'll use cn, a multipurpose attribute type used to specify common names of any entity.
sentences.cn: 具体来说，我将使用cn属性类型，这是个多用途属性类型，可以用来指定任意实体的公共名称。
